Text 4.original: Did you ever felt out of the decision making process in your town?
We are the future of our city so we should contribuate in the decisions.
Therefore I will talk about the sucesfull work of youth councils in the UK.
Do you remember when the skatepark of our city close for longer than a year?
Or wen the gym close and insted a library was build?
Do you agree with this decisions in our city?
Probably the most of us dont.
So it's time to change these injustice.
The solution are the youth councils beacause there young people express the opinion of they and be heard.
So what do you thing about seting up a youth council in our hometown?
Their are lots of reasons to joining it.
First of all young people is like the future light of our generations, so they opinions should be heard.
In youth coincils teens voices get heard and become part of the decisionmaking process.
In the long term this means that teenagers can change, decide things in the city and protect space they use.
Therefore the participants of a youth concil can make a difference with their ideas and have impact in our city changing injustices and defend teenagers interests.
Secondly I want propose to you the following question:
As teenager have you ever wonderd how to grow personally and become new skills?
Probably yes because all of us want to create a better version of ourselfes daily.
Do you know that with councils you can develop personally and learn new skills?
In youth councils teens have to think for themself to contribute with new ideas.
In addition they learn to express and explain they ideas to the other council member.
At last they also can develop social skills because they meet new people in the councils and have to work together.
Concluding schoolmates, the future of the city is in our hands and we can started changing it now.
Do you want start creating a better city together?
